! muxt check
stderr '<\.Missing>: Missing not found on struct\{Field1 int}'

-- template.gohtml --
{{.Missing}}
-- go.mod --
module example.com

go 1.24
-- main.go --
package main

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
	"io"
)

//go:embed *.gohtml
var source embed.FS

var templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(source, "*"))

func main() {
	var data struct {
  	Field1 int
  }
	_ = templates.ExecuteTemplate(io.Discard, "template.gohtml", data)
}
